power.title: Astral Condemndation
power.fluff: You brand a foe with your god's glowing symbol to drain power from its attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to all damage rolls equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Avenging Flame
power.fluff: You imbue your weapon with divine fire and attack your enemy, the flames spreading over it and flaring each time it dares to make an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

If the target makes an attack on its turn, it can't make a saving throw against this ongoing damage on that turn. If it makes a triggered attack outside of its turn, it takes a penalty to the next saving throw it makes against this ongoing damage equal to your Strength modifier.

power.title: Beacon of Hope
power.fluff: You release a burst of divine energy that weakens your foes even as it heals your allies, and lingers within your holy symbol for a short time, improving your ability to heal

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is weakened until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You and each ally in the burst regain hit points equal to 4 + your Charisma modifier.
Until the end of the encounter, whenever you restore hit points using a Healing power, the recipient regains 5 additional hit points.

power.title: Cascade of Light
power.fluff: You raise your holy symbol and sear your foe with divine radiance

section.text: The target gains vulnerable 5 all against your attacks (save ends).

power.title: Curse of Misfortune
power.fluff: Fate intervenes and consigns the enemy to defeat as its attacks fail and its stratagems lead to ruin

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is cursed with misfortune (save ends).
While cursed, the target must roll twice and use the lower result when it makes an attack roll.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target takes psychic damage equal to 4 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes the aftereffect damage.

power.title: Font of Tears
power.fluff: A glimmering rain showers enemies around you and saps their will

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of shimmering energy until the end of your next turn.
Any enemy that starts its turn in the zone takes a -2 penalty to attack to attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Gift of Incomparable Strength
power.fluff: Divine energy flows through your body, and you call out a fierce challenge to a foe facing you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is marked by you until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Hald damage, and the target is marked by you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack when you charge.

power.title: Horde of Spiders
power.fluff: Tiny black spiders assault your enemy, burrowing into its skin and causing terrible pain

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage, and the target suffers from a painful poison (save ends).
While suffering from the poison, the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage and grants combat advantage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage (save ends).

power.title: Inflict Pain
power.fluff: Calling upon the wrath of your deity, you wrack your enemy with pain

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends) or until the start of your next turn, whichever lasts longer.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Inflict Wounds
power.fluff: With just a touch, your foe's body is rent by horrid wounds

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes 3d6 + your Wisdom modifier necrotic damage.

power.title: Lesser Aspect of Wrath
power.fluff: You glow with the wrath of your god

section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:
► a +1 power bonus to attack rolls.
► Any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Moment of Glory
power.fluff: You call down a brilliant column of light that drives your enemies to the ground and bolsters your allies against harm

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You push the target 3 squares, and knock it prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target half the distance.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you and each ally in the blast gain resist 5 all.

power.title: Moon Weapon
power.fluff: The light of the full moon surrounds you, alighting on the weapon you touch to limn it with a silver glow

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, the target weapon sheds bright light in a 1-square radius, and it is considered a silvered weapon.
In addition, any damage dealt by Weapon attacks using the target weapon is radiant damage, unless the damage already has a type. Such attacks also gain the Radiant keyword.

power.title: Nimbus of Holy Shielding
power.fluff: A nimbus of radiant energy flashes from your weapon, creating a pattern of gleaming runes that offer protection

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 2 (Divine) until the end of the encounter.
Allies in the aura gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses.

power.title: Shield of the Gods
power.fluff: Slamming your weapon into the ground, you create a blast of force that bowls over your foes and then coalesces into a glowing shield

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier force damage, and you knock the target prone.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose yourself or an ally within 5 squares of you. The chosen creature gains a +3 shield bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of the encounter. You can use the following action at-will:

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: Choose yourself or an ally within 5 squares of you. You transfer the shield bonus to the chosen ally.

power.title: Summon Guardian of Faith
power.fluff: You conjure a ghostly guardian, which glows with your deity's symbol and emits a burst of painful radiance against your enemies if they stay too close to it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Medium guardian of faith in an unoccupied space within range.
The guardian of faith remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the guardian is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Weapon of Astral Flame
power.fluff: You conjure a weapon of divine flame that duplicates the one you wield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a weapon of astral flame in your space. The weapon lasts until the end of your next turn, and moves with you when you move, remaining in your space.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The weapon persists, and makes the Divine Flames attack.
When it appears, the weapon makes the following melee attack, using the same range as your weapon:

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
